content:
I apologize for the confusion. Here's a revised version that is shorter:

Imagine standing on a boat in crystal-clear waters, basking in the warm Hawaiian sun. Suddenly, a giant splash catches your eye, and you see a humpback whale breaching just yards away. This incredible experience awaits you and your family at the Hawaiian Islands Humpback Whale National Marine Sanctuary in Kihei. But that's just the beginning of the family-friendly activities that Kihei has to offer. Plan your trip with Family Vacation Rentals to enjoy a wide selection of kid-friendly and family-friendly vacation rentals in Kihei and other family-friendly areas on Maui. Start creating unforgettable memories with your family today.
